title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail: Our Staff & Offices
body: Our Staff & Offices       Administration of the federal role in development and management of the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail network is delegated to a full-time superintendent, with administrative and project support from staff in park, regional and program offices.   For more information, contact: Superintendent Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail Office National Park Service Post Office Box B Harpers Ferry WV 25425 304-535-4014 or e-mail us or Office of Communications National Capital Region 1100 Ohio Drive S.W. Washington DC 20242 202-619-7222
